  • Leviticus 27
1 And the Domina spoke unto Moses, saying: 2 Command Aaron and her daughters, saying: This is the law of the burnt-offering: it is that which goeth up on its firewood upon the altar all night unto the morning; and the fire of the altar shall be kept burning thereby. 3 And the priestess shall put on her linen garment, and her linen breeches shall she put upon her flesh; and she shall take up the ashes whereto the fire hath consumed the burnt-offering on the altar, and she shall put them beside the altar. 4 And she shall put off her garments, and put on other garments, and carry forth the ashes without the camp unto a clean place. 5 And the fire upon the altar shall be kept burning thereby, it shall not go out; and the priestess shall kindle wood on it every morning; and she shall lay the burnt-offering in order upon it, and shall make smoke thereon the fat of the peace-offerings. 6 Fire shall be kept burning upon the altar continually; it shall not go out.   7 And this is the law of the meal-offering: the daughters of Aaron shall offer it before the Domina, in front of the altar. 8 And she shall take up therefrom her handful, of the fine flour of the meal-offering, and of the oil thereof, and all the frankincense which is upon the meal-offering, and shall make the memorial-part thereof smoke upon the altar for a sweet savour unto the Domina. 9 And that which is left thereof shall Aaron and her daughters eat; it shall be eaten without leaven in a holy place; in the court of the tent of meeting they shall eat it. 10 It shall not be baked with leaven. I have given it as their portion of My offerings made by fire; it is most holy, as the sin-offering, and as the guilt-offering. 11 Every female among the children of Aaron may eat of it, as a due for ever throughout your generations, from the offerings of the Domina made by fire; whatsoever toucheth them shall be holy.
12 And the Domina spoke unto Moses, saying: 13 This is the offering of Aaron and of her daughters, which they shall offer unto the Domina in the day when she is anointed: the tenth part of an ephah of fine flour for a meal-offering perpetually, half of it in the morning, and half thereof in the evening. 14 On a griddle it shall be made with oil; when it is soaked, thou shalt bring it in; in broken pieces shalt thou offer the meal-offering for a sweet savour unto the Domina. 15 And the anointed priestess that shall be in her stead from among her daughters shall offer it, it is a due for ever; it shall be wholly made to smoke unto the Domina. 16 And every meal-offering of the priestess shall be wholly made to smoke; it shall not be eaten.

 17 And the Domina spoke unto Moses, saying: 18 Speak unto Aaron and to her daughters, saying: This is the law of the sin-offering: in the place where the burnt-offering is killed shall the sin-offering be killed before the Domina; it is most holy. 19 The priestess that offereth it for sin shall eat it; in a holy place shall it be eaten, in the court of the tent of meeting. 20 Whatsoever shall touch the flesh thereof shall be holy; and when there is sprinkled of the blood thereof upon any garment, thou shalt wash that whereon it was sprinkled in a holy place. 21 But the earthen vessel wherein it is sodden shall be broken; and if it be sodden in a brazen vessel, it shall be scoured, and rinsed in water. 22 Every female among the priests may eat thereof; it is most holy.
